Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e2.equipments.hairdryer.mil

package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e2.equipments.hairdryer.mil

MIL simulation models of the hair dryer.

Licence

This software is a computer program whose purpose is to implement a mock-up of household energy management system.

This package defines the MIL simulation models for the hair dryer.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e2.equipments.hairdryer.mil.events
    MIL simulation events of the hair dryer.
  • Class
    Description
    HairDryerCoupledModel
    The class HairDryerCoupledModel defines the DEVS coupled model for a first prototype example of the hair dryer simulator.
    HairDryerElectricityModel
    The class HairDryerElectricity_MILModel defines a MIL model of the electricity consumption of a hair dryer.
    HairDryerElectricityModel.HairDryerElectricityReport
    The class HairDryerElectricityReport implements the simulation report for the HairDryerElectricityModel.
    HairDryerElectricityModel.State
    The enumeration State describes the discrete states or modes of the hair dryer.
    HairDryerUserModel
    The class HairDryerUserModel defines a very simple user model for the hair dryer.
    RunHairDryerUnitaryMILSimulation
    The class RunHairDryerUnitarySimulation is the main class used to run simulations on the example models of the hair dryer in isolation.
